instructions: put the dinner plate at the bottom of the table cloth in the center
put the dinner fork on the left side of the dinner plate with the tines pointing up
put the salad fork on the left side of the dinner fork with the tines pointing up
put the dinner knife at the right side of the plate with the blade up
put the salad knife on the right side of the dinner knife with the blade up
put the soup spoon on the right side of the salad knife with the bowl up
put the water glass above the dinner knife and the dinner plate
put the wine glass to the right of the water glass
put the wine glass to the right of the wine glass
put the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon
put the bread plate above the forks
put the butter knife on the bread plate diagonally with the blade facing upper left
put the dessert fork horizontally above the plate, with its tines to the right
put the dessert spoon horizontally above the dessert fork, with its bowl to the left
put the napkin on the plate
